summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Human Services Department; authorizing the execution of agreements with the Workforce Development Council and United Way of King County for financial assistance for the operation of the Seattle Youth Employment Program; increasing the expenditure allowance in the 2000 budget of the Human Services Department by making reimbursable appropriations; creating certain positions; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Housing, Human Services, Education and Civil Rights
